summary: A reformed outlaw becomes stranded after an aborted train robbery with two other passengers and is forced to rejoin his old outlaw band.
cast: Gary Cooper|Julie London|Lee J. Cobb|Arthur O'Connell|Jack Lord|John Dehner|Royal Dano|Robert J. Wilke|Joe Dominguez|Dick Elliott|Frank Ferguson|Herman Hack|Signe Hack|Ann Kunde|Tom London|Tina Menard|Emory Parnell|Chuck Roberson|Glen Walters|Guy Wilkerson|Jack Williams
keywords: two gun holster|gun holster|gun|holster|double gun holster
title: El hombre del Oeste
